timeline.message: REVERT ME: Remove local sym tables
Make base class for symbol declarators
Add a bunch of additional tests

Revert "REVERT ME remove dependency on #2271"

This reverts commit 19d8e2fc6943e6fc7b224724fbcd998d4a969c37.

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -49,9 +55,57 @@ default String getSimpleName() {
      * Returns the binary name of this type declaration. This
      * is like {@link Class#getName()}.
      */

     String getBinaryName();

timeline.bodyText:
This is a bit surprising in comparison the formal parameters - in ASTFormalParameter, the owner node is the direct parent and not the grand parent. Maybe something to consider later?
ASTFormalParameter::getOwnerList() vs. ASTTypeParameter::getOwner() ...
timeline.author: adangel

replies.bodyText: That's true, I'll add a TODO on the wiki to review that
replies.author: oowekyala

timeline.bodyText: So this will become what previously was called "SymbolTableFacade"? 👍

timeline.bodyText: This looks like another API PMD provides now... we'll definitively need good documentations and usage examples...
